H.content: “at this very moment”: antinomy of laws in the plural and absolutely singular law
H.linkedContent: “at this very moment”: antinomy of laws in the plural and absolutely singular law

H.content: there are 2 plurals, different at same time: 1) multiplicity, plural laws 2) One + a multiplicity, One + n [plus d’un]
H.linkedContent: there are 2 plurals, different at same time: 1) multiplicity, plural laws 2) One + a multiplicity, One + n [plus d’un]

H.content: One + n, the antinomic addition, adds conditional laws to unconditional law of hospitality
H.linkedContent: One + n, the antinomic addition, adds conditional laws to unconditional law of hospitality

GT.content: even if gift is a simulacrum, il faut (one must) rendre compte (render an account) of the possibility of this simulacrum, and render account of desire to render account > can’t be done w/out principle of reason (principium reddendae rationis)
GT.linkedContent: even if gift is a simulacrum, il faut (one must) rendre compte (render an account) of the possibility of this simulacrum, and render account of desire to render account > can’t be done w/out principle of reason (principium reddendae rationis)

GT.content: perversity can always secretly corrupt the “donner raison à l’autre”: ratio, logos, is on your side [re: “Counterfeit Money”], what counts, can be counted, you took maximum pleasure
GT.linkedContent: perversity can always secretly corrupt the “donner raison à l’autre”: ratio, logos, is on your side [re: “Counterfeit Money”], what counts, can be counted, you took maximum pleasure

GT.content: link btwn morality & calculation of pleasure equivocates good intentions, precipitates gift towards its end, is its very apocalypse [Hamacher], truth of gift > end of gift
GT.linkedContent: link btwn morality & calculation of pleasure equivocates good intentions, precipitates gift towards its end, is its very apocalypse [Hamacher], truth of gift > end of gift

GT.content: several meanings of vous avez raison: 1) animal rationale (logon ekhon) 2) know how to count, account, principle of reason, we are men of knowledge, good narrators 3) our calculation has prevailed, we have controlled (arraisonné) (the other) by reasoning
GT.linkedContent: several meanings of vous avez raison: 1) animal rationale (logon ekhon) 2) know how to count, account, principle of reason, we are men of knowledge, good narrators 3) our calculation has prevailed, we have controlled (arraisonné) (the other) by reasoning

R.content: technique, “technical measure of equality” is not a mishap, chance for incommensurable, technique before calculating technique [?] [POOF]
R.linkedContent: technique, “technical measure of equality” is not a mishap, chance for incommensurable, technique before calculating technique [?] [POOF]

R.content: [re: democratic count] how many voices, how many votes for the unconscious?
R.linkedContent: [re: democratic count] how many voices, how many votes for the unconscious?

SPOM.content: commitment of justice, to whom? to life (natural life, life of spirit) of living being > that this is irrefutable carries justice beyond present life, non pas vers la mort mais vers une sur-vie, where life & death are traces of traces
SPOM.linkedContent: commitment of justice, to whom? to life (natural life, life of spirit) of living being > that this is irrefutable carries justice beyond present life, non pas vers la mort mais vers une sur-vie, where life & death are traces of traces

SPOM.content: alors il y a de l’esprit, des esprits, et il faut compter avec eux > le plus d’un
SPOM.linkedContent: alors il y a de l’esprit, des esprits, et il faut compter avec eux > le plus d’un

SPOM.content: one cannot count ghosts because ghost is # itself, numerous, innumerable as number, cannot count supplements or surplus values of arch-specter (as father as capital or Plato’s good)
SPOM.linkedContent: one cannot count ghosts because ghost is # itself, numerous, innumerable as number, cannot count supplements or surplus values of arch-specter (as father as capital or Plato’s good)

SPOM.content: one will never be done counting, that’s why one counts
SPOM.linkedContent: one will never be done counting, that’s why one counts

SPOM.content: speculation as count is always theoretical and theological, it believes in what it sees, in representations, ordinary theology believes in ghosts of sensuous imagination, speculative theology, ghosts of non-sensuous abstraction (Feuerbach)
SPOM.linkedContent: speculation as count is always theoretical and theological, it believes in what it sees, in representations, ordinary theology believes in ghosts of sensuous imagination, speculative theology, ghosts of non-sensuous abstraction (Feuerbach)

SPOM.content: there is always more than one commodity, more than one spirit, # belongs to the movement of the commodity
SPOM.linkedContent: there is always more than one commodity, more than one spirit, # belongs to the movement of the commodity

POOF.content: the 3 meanings of political crime: 1) assassinations that litter History 2) crime in which political being of politics is constituted [Schmitt, force of law] 3) crime that reduces politics to something else, crime against man qua political animal > w/in these crimes, infinite abysses of imputability, edges of juridical, techno-biological, are we sure we can distinguish btwn death & killing? btwn homicide & genocide? why should a question of # persist in these questions?
POOF.linkedContent: the 3 meanings of political crime: 1) assassinations that litter History 2) crime in which political being of politics is constituted [Schmitt, force of law] 3) crime that reduces politics to something else, crime against man qua political animal > w/in these crimes, infinite abysses of imputability, edges of juridical, techno-biological, are we sure we can distinguish btwn death & killing? btwn homicide & genocide? why should a question of # persist in these questions?

POOF.content: count, number, calculate: acc. Aristotle, friends must be small in #, what’s small?
POOF.linkedContent: count, number, calculate: acc. Aristotle, friends must be small in #, what’s small?

POOF.content: democracy counts votes & subjects, but doesn’t/shouldn’t count ordinary singularities: no numerus clausus for arrivants
POOF.linkedContent: democracy counts votes & subjects, but doesn’t/shouldn’t count ordinary singularities: no numerus clausus for arrivants

POOF.content: small in # doesn’t characterize friends, it counts those we are speaking of, cites the exemplary, naming the rare illuminates, projects name’s renown beyond death
POOF.linkedContent: small in # doesn’t characterize friends, it counts those we are speaking of, cites the exemplary, naming the rare illuminates, projects name’s renown beyond death

POOF.content: for Aristotle, a friend chooses knowing rather than being known, counts, refers, prefers, chooses to love > irreducible difference btwn active/passive, c’est elle qui compte et permet de compter
POOF.linkedContent: for Aristotle, a friend chooses knowing rather than being known, counts, refers, prefers, chooses to love > irreducible difference btwn active/passive, c’est elle qui compte et permet de compter

POOF.content: via Aristotle, one must choose & prefer friends (election & selection), it takes time > for Aristotle, those who don’t have friends count friends among things (prágmata), possessions, the malevolent place friends in field of calculable hypothesis > yet, the choice of friends, that their # must be small, reintroduces #, calculation, into multiplicity of incalculable singularities: a certain aristocracy in arithmetic of the choice
POOF.linkedContent: via Aristotle, one must choose & prefer friends (election & selection), it takes time > for Aristotle, those who don’t have friends count friends among things (prágmata), possessions, the malevolent place friends in field of calculable hypothesis > yet, the choice of friends, that their # must be small, reintroduces #, calculation, into multiplicity of incalculable singularities: a certain aristocracy in arithmetic of the choice

POOF.content: via Aristotle, in economy of time, even in the instant, plenitude of enérgeia linked to #: friendship must count but resists enumeration, quantification (# isn’t forbidden but the numerous, the crowd, is) > for a finite being, test of friendship is an endurance of arithmetic
POOF.linkedContent: via Aristotle, in economy of time, even in the instant, plenitude of enérgeia linked to #: friendship must count but resists enumeration, quantification (# isn’t forbidden but the numerous, the crowd, is) > for a finite being, test of friendship is an endurance of arithmetic

POOF.content: wound opens w/ necessity to count one’s friends, democracy’s 2 irreducible laws: 1) respect for irreducible singularity or alterity 2) calculation of majorities, representable subjects, all equal
POOF.linkedContent: wound opens w/ necessity to count one’s friends, democracy’s 2 irreducible laws: 1) respect for irreducible singularity or alterity 2) calculation of majorities, representable subjects, all equal

POOF.content: mais là où tout autre est également tout autre > political desire borne by this disjunction, bears chance of future of democracy, divided virtue, inadequate to itself, chaos opening in silence
POOF.linkedContent: mais là où tout autre est également tout autre > political desire borne by this disjunction, bears chance of future of democracy, divided virtue, inadequate to itself, chaos opening in silence

POOF.content: no virtue, w/out the tragedy of # w/out #, perhaps more unthinkable than tragedy
POOF.linkedContent: no virtue, w/out the tragedy of # w/out #, perhaps more unthinkable than tragedy

POOF.content: that there can only be friends w/ enemies, that when one desires enemies, we can only count friends—madness looms (in every teleiopoetic event), plus de sens, empty resembles overflow
POOF.linkedContent: that there can only be friends w/ enemies, that when one desires enemies, we can only count friends—madness looms (in every teleiopoetic event), plus de sens, empty resembles overflow

POOF.content: teleiopoiós: that which renders absolute, perfect, complete, brings to an end; tele: distance, far-removed, spanning of space > rendering, making, transforming, producing, creating—this is what counts! > occurs in auto-tele-affection of sentence, always auto-teleipoetics, but auto is the splitting effect not simple origin [see auto-affection in VP]
POOF.linkedContent: teleiopoiós: that which renders absolute, perfect, complete, brings to an end; tele: distance, far-removed, spanning of space > rendering, making, transforming, producing, creating—this is what counts! > occurs in auto-tele-affection of sentence, always auto-teleipoetics, but auto is the splitting effect not simple origin [see auto-affection in VP]

POOF.content: tension btwn democracy & aristocracy to do w/ #, with the counting of friends
POOF.linkedContent: tension btwn democracy & aristocracy to do w/ #, with the counting of friends

POOF.content: Montaigne’s audacious/uncontestable description of friend, via Aristotle, qua one soul (singularity) in 2 bodies (duplicity): philía most devoted to other becomes friendship of self, philautia (narcissism), a correspondence (convenance, oikeiótēs), all division is driven out, neither friend can give to each other > this is the communal/communist consequence: communism dreaming in secret of the secret, communism which doesn’t count, no further than to ‘one,’ so not even to ‘one’
POOF.linkedContent: Montaigne’s audacious/uncontestable description of friend, via Aristotle, qua one soul (singularity) in 2 bodies (duplicity): philía most devoted to other becomes friendship of self, philautia (narcissism), a correspondence (convenance, oikeiótēs), all division is driven out, neither friend can give to each other > this is the communal/communist consequence: communism dreaming in secret of the secret, communism which doesn’t count, no further than to ‘one,’ so not even to ‘one’

POOF.content: to maintain indivisibility of friendship, must harbor the taste of death, division only affects bodies
POOF.linkedContent: to maintain indivisibility of friendship, must harbor the taste of death, division only affects bodies

POOF.content: Montaigne’s indivisible (singular) friendship permits & interdicts counting: only “common friendships can be shared”
POOF.linkedContent: Montaigne’s indivisible (singular) friendship permits & interdicts counting: only “common friendships can be shared”

POOF.content: [quasi-thesis of POOF] a justice that cares for the humanity in the human (a principle of infinity) would destroy finite proportionality that ordains calculation of worth, in this way it resembles Montaigne’s friendship > it doesn’t, however, in the sense that Montaigne’s disproportion is extremely rare, inegalitarian heteronomy remains in tact: what if a certain equality could be saved in respect of dissymmetrical/heteronomic singularities > this equality would be at once calculable/incalculable, it would count on the calculable
POOF.linkedContent: [quasi-thesis of POOF] a justice that cares for the humanity in the human (a principle of infinity) would destroy finite proportionality that ordains calculation of worth, in this way it resembles Montaigne’s friendship > it doesn’t, however, in the sense that Montaigne’s disproportion is extremely rare, inegalitarian heteronomy remains in tact: what if a certain equality could be saved in respect of dissymmetrical/heteronomic singularities > this equality would be at once calculable/incalculable, it would count on the calculable

POOF.content: via Aristotle, the just wage (gage), a fee, salary, 3rd party & common measure—war ensues wherever common measure & straight and narrow path recoils (se dérobe) [translator also translates the Chapter Title, Replis,” as recoils] > in these grievances, where calculation becomes incalculable, where I can’t count on you, there is no friend
POOF.linkedContent: via Aristotle, the just wage (gage), a fee, salary, 3rd party & common measure—war ensues wherever common measure & straight and narrow path recoils (se dérobe) [translator also translates the Chapter Title, Replis,” as recoils] > in these grievances, where calculation becomes incalculable, where I can’t count on you, there is no friend

POOF.content: the dative version of omega ω would produce the meaning: ‘too many friends means no friend’ > this is the recoil (repli) version, more modest, it does reopen the question of “how many?”
POOF.linkedContent: the dative version of omega ω would produce the meaning: ‘too many friends means no friend’ > this is the recoil (repli) version, more modest, it does reopen the question of “how many?”

POOF.content: the hyperbole of an extreme middle in Aristotle, moderation, proper measure: this applies to # of friends & ‘threshold of tolerance’ re: border btwn pólis and ethnos [immigration]
POOF.linkedContent: the hyperbole of an extreme middle in Aristotle, moderation, proper measure: this applies to # of friends & ‘threshold of tolerance’ re: border btwn pólis and ethnos [immigration]

PAS.content: [on not citing his sources] the worst méconaissance of Blanchot’s text, hand over incommensurable in it to the market, the hierarchy, the dominant effects tied to name & law, but [other voice] there’s always benefits of mastery for sovereign renunciation, it’s gonna happen, il faut en rendre compte, the gift itself never forgets itself, nor the forgetting

SH.linkedContent: ring, sign of belonging itself, condition of return > cipher of seal, imprint of ring, counts more than content of message, what matters is mark of belonging, manifested alliance

SH.content: there is a holocaust (all-consuming) for every date: “every hour counts its holocaust”
SH.linkedContent: there is a holocaust (all-consuming) for every date: “every hour counts its holocaust”

DS.content: blank, counting on and discounting itself at once
DS.linkedContent: blank, counting on and discounting itself at once

POS.content: writing structurally carries w/in itself (counts-discounts) its own erasure, while marking what remains of this erasure
POS.linkedContent: writing structurally carries w/in itself (counts-discounts) its own erasure, while marking what remains of this erasure

O.content: Hegel: spirit is a trinity, but cannot be counted (counting is a bad procedure)
O.linkedContent: Hegel: spirit is a trinity, but cannot be counted (counting is a bad procedure)

O.content: dissemination sets up a pharmacy, can’t count by 1’s, 2’s, 3’s — everything starts w/ dyad (not conflictual, hierarchical, dual oppositions)
O.linkedContent: dissemination sets up a pharmacy, can’t count by 1’s, 2’s, 3’s — everything starts w/ dyad (not conflictual, hierarchical, dual oppositions)

O.content: le détour d’une écriture dont one ne revient pas, dissemination: this question calls for restaging of arithmos, “counting” as “bad procedure,” and rereading the rhythmos of Democritus, which philosophy has never been able to reckon w/ (n’aura pu compter) > philosophy accounts for itself by rising out of, and then circulating w/in its speculative necessity, the [envelope of writing]
O.linkedContent: le détour d’une écriture dont one ne revient pas, dissemination: this question calls for restaging of arithmos, “counting” as “bad procedure,” and rereading the rhythmos of Democritus, which philosophy has never been able to reckon w/ (n’aura pu compter) > philosophy accounts for itself by rising out of, and then circulating w/in its speculative necessity, the [envelope of writing]

SW.linkedContent: veil as “sa laisse (lead, leash, let)” > tears skin, touches, punctures, pulls, doesn’t just veil gaze; voilà, every word counts

C.linkedContent: “things won’t stop computing in me,” Derrida wants to touch contingency of Titus-Carmel’s 127 coffins

NOY.content: thought of history of Being affected by internal epochē, divides, suspends the yes: will is not identical to itself (along w/ many other things) > yes as the incalculable, the promise: [quasi-, fable of] “giving reason,” “giving an account,” the countability of the innumerable yesses
NOY.linkedContent: thought of history of Being affected by internal epochē, divides, suspends the yes: will is not identical to itself (along w/ many other things) > yes as the incalculable, the promise: [quasi-, fable of] “giving reason,” “giving an account,” the countability of the innumerable yesses

NOY.content: yes, (already but always) faithful countersignature, can’t be counted: it always sends itself off in number (il s’envoie toujours en nombre)
NOY.linkedContent: yes, (already but always) faithful countersignature, can’t be counted: it always sends itself off in number (il s’envoie toujours en nombre)

AD.content: for Levinas, Torah–Jerusalem [inscribe promise in earthly Jerusalem], co-presence of justice, system, State > negotiation w/ non-negotiable must find “better” or less bad (moins mauvaise): nothing counts more, nothing weighs more heavily (rien ne compte plus gravement) than quotations around word better (meilleur)—it’s not good, it’s a stopgap (pis-aller)
AD.linkedContent: for Levinas, Torah–Jerusalem [inscribe promise in earthly Jerusalem], co-presence of justice, system, State > negotiation w/ non-negotiable must find “better” or less bad (moins mauvaise): nothing counts more, nothing weighs more heavily (rien ne compte plus gravement) than quotations around word better (meilleur)—it’s not good, it’s a stopgap (pis-aller)

BSi.content: in Monsieur Teste, a Nietzschean kind of superman, infinitely cunning and infinitely bête solitary types: incalculable/hyperbolic arithmetic turns “who” into “what”
BSi.linkedContent: in Monsieur Teste, a Nietzschean kind of superman, infinitely cunning and infinitely bête solitary types: incalculable/hyperbolic arithmetic turns “who” into “what”

BSi.content: Valéry wagers on CAP: le cap Pensée; the high point (comble) of internal politics, a multipli-city of selves, when the excess that exceeds un-counts the other & outside > jealousy is always the hight point that completes me, supplements me because receives, welcomes, no longer chases out other in me: one only ever jealous of oneself, the selfsame > explains all the loves and wars (which take place btwn the same, the others as the same): as soon as there’s a double capitalized phallic erection (CAP, standing, being on a cape) here called Thought
BSi.linkedContent: Valéry wagers on CAP: le cap Pensée; the high point (comble) of internal politics, a multipli-city of selves, when the excess that exceeds un-counts the other & outside > jealousy is always the hight point that completes me, supplements me because receives, welcomes, no longer chases out other in me: one only ever jealous of oneself, the selfsame > explains all the loves and wars (which take place btwn the same, the others as the same): as soon as there’s a double capitalized phallic erection (CAP, standing, being on a cape) here called Thought

BSi.content: Nietzsche’s superman, and the sovereign too, a hyperbolic, sublime, “higher than height,” more about excess than height, it’s the more than that counts, the surplus, absolutely more: could as well be a maximum of smallness, God as small (sovereign use of nanotechnology)
BSi.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s superman, and the sovereign too, a hyperbolic, sublime, “higher than height,” more about excess than height, it’s the more than that counts, the surplus, absolutely more: could as well be a maximum of smallness, God as small (sovereign use of nanotechnology)

EU.content: every critique of censorship is a critique of judgment, censorship is a judgment, proposes laws, tribunal, code > censere, to evaluate (réputer), compute, count—ratio, “census,” “cens,” is enumeration of citizens
EU.linkedContent: every critique of censorship is a critique of judgment, censorship is a judgment, proposes laws, tribunal, code > censere, to evaluate (réputer), compute, count—ratio, “census,” “cens,” is enumeration of citizens
